      Methods in playn.core with parameters of type Pointer.Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Pointer.Listener.onPointerCancel(Pointer.Event event)
      Called when a drag is canceled (always after start and takes the place of end).
      void Pointer.Adapter.onPointerCancel(Pointer.Event event) 
      void Pointer.Listener.onPointerDrag(Pointer.Event event)
      Called when the pointer drags (always between start/end events).
      void Pointer.Adapter.onPointerDrag(Pointer.Event event) 
      void Pointer.Listener.onPointerEnd(Pointer.Event event)
      Called when the pointer event ends.

      Called when the pointer event starts.
